title: UpiwArt
author: UpiwArt
content: I'm new to this forum what should I do next after creating this account?

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: Read as many threads for beginners  and learn how to stay on the forum without being ban

comments.author: UpiwArt
comments.created_time: May 28, 2022, 06:16:34 PMLast edit: May 29, 2022, 10:24:22 AM by Mr. Big
comments.body: Quote from: odolvlobo on May 28, 2022, 05:59:46 PMQuote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 05:56:42 PMI'm new to this forum what should I do next after creating this account?Read and learn.Ok sir I will do your suggestionthanks for the reply sir Quote from: ololajulo on May 28, 2022, 06:08:39 PMRead as many threads for beginners  and learn how to stay on the forum without being banwill after i learn and understand it i will benefit? sorry for my bad question

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 06:23:32 PMwill after i learn and understand it i will benefit? sorry for my bad questionLearning is already a benefit. However, let me help you a little:Some want to benefit from this forum by learning how to tackle best the cryptocurrencies.Some want to benefit from this forum by advertising their businesses.Some want to benefit from this forum by selling things (usually art or collectibles).Some want to benefit from this forum by trying to do tasks for coins.Think of this forum as a community. Many people. Many goals. All benefit in a way or another.How could one give you an answer that works for you if he doesn't know your goals?I think that you are not being completely honest with us (or yourself), I think that you may have heard that some friends of you are earning money and you thought you'll give it a shot, but don't know where to start from. Is that the case?

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 05:56:42 PMI'm new to this forum what should I do next after creating this account?Hello good day OP and welcome to this wonderful forum. Since you are new here and if you are here to learn or gathered more information then I tell you this that you are in the right place cause this is an open forum you can share your knowledge here and gathered more knowledge as well.And you must remember this OP do not break the forum rules and then you will be successful someday.Beginners & Help Encyclopedia [UPD: +Electrum Board] this topic will be your guide for your journey here in forum this us created by our forum mate Ratimov.Good luck to your journey OP.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: You can start learning about spamming from now. Making a reply with few lines just to say thank you and consecutively following it up with another few Line post as you have done on this thread is spamming, try the best was you can to be modestly constructive to highly constructive, no matter what you here for, learning is/should be your beginning goal. From the looks of things you are about benefits and earning but put all that away, and make learning your trophy target.

comments.author: CryptoPanda
comments.body: Welcome to the forum. As a newbie, first thing you want to do is to get yourself acquainted with the forum rules, forum terms, ranks, merits and activity. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0 Quote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 06:23:32 PMwill after i learn and understand it i will benefit? sorry for my bad questionI believe you're genuinely interested in Bitcoin that's why you registered here. All we do here is talk crypto everyday, the things you learn here will help you understand cryptocurrencies better than the average Joe

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Read the rules, OP. Some already linked one of the thread in here.Though I know you're still a newbie, but I was a bit confused on why you're asking what to do next after creating the account? I am sure that you already had an intention at least what to do here after you created your account. Am I the only one that had the thought of that?

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: At first welcome to the community of bitcointalk. In normal circumstances, this venue is a place were you will obtain the information of bitcoin for free. But it have a condition that governor the community. The things to do is numerous but very easy to comprehend, study the environmental system or factor and know the essence of this forum. Read up through your research and commitment for development of new innovations through the status of your abilities to encode and also decode

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 06:23:32 PMQuote from: ololajulo on May 28, 2022, 06:08:39 PMRead as many threads for beginners  and learn how to stay on the forum without being banwill after i learn and understand it i will benefit? sorry for my bad questionThis depends on what your goals are here. If you are here to learn something about cryptocurrencies, then it will definitely benefit you.Let us know what you are trying to accomplish, and maybe we can provide you with better guidance.

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Welcome on board. The most important thing for you now is to understand the forum rules and this is what will help.Read Newbies - Read before postingSignature Campaign Guidelines (read this before starting or joining a campaign)This is guide for newbie and it was created by Ratimov

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 05:56:42 PMI'm new to this forum what should I do next after creating this account?Welcome, After you have read the pinned threads and other threads for newbies in this section. Next, set your personal Bitcointalk forum goals. Below are the 3 questions I asked and answered myself when I signed up for Bitcointalk:1- Why am I here?2- What do I hope to learn and achieve in 6 months on the forum?3- How do I plan to contribute positively to the forum as a member?If you can answer these questions truthfully then, you are on your way to becoming a valuable member of the community.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on May 28, 2022, 09:10:49 PMQuote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 06:23:32 PMQuote from: ololajulo on May 28, 2022, 06:08:39 PMRead as many threads for beginners  and learn how to stay on the forum without being banwill after i learn and understand it i will benefit? sorry for my bad questionThis depends on what your goals are here. If you are here to learn something about cryptocurrencies, then it will definitely benefit you.Let us know what you are trying to accomplish, and maybe we can provide you with better guidance.The objectives of seventy five percent of users who find their self in the community of bitcointalk is same. Right now none of this new users make inquiring or research and see this platform somewhere else before joining, this correct time many of them come the recommendation of existing members or users here, so therefore i don't believe that it have vital objective than participating in signature working campaign.

comments.author: UpiwArt
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on May 28, 2022, 06:37:39 PMQuote from: UpiwArt on May 28, 2022, 06:23:32 PMwill after i learn and understand it i will benefit? sorry for my bad questionLearning is already a benefit. However, let me help you a little:Some want to benefit from this forum by learning how to tackle best the cryptocurrencies.Some want to benefit from this forum by advertising their businesses.Some want to benefit from this forum by selling things (usually art or collectibles).Some want to benefit from this forum by trying to do tasks for coins.Think of this forum as a community. Many people. Many goals. All benefit in a way or another.How could one give you an answer that works for you if he doesn't know your goals?I think that you are not being completely honest with us (or yourself), I think that you may have heard that some friends of you are earning money and you thought you'll give it a shot, but don't know where to start from. Is that the case?that's true sir my friends get income from this forum but I don't know where to start because I am a person who has a high sense of curiosity so I want to explore it so that I can be like them even more than them in profit

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 29, 2022, 04:49:48 AMthat's true sir my friends get income from this forum but I don't know where to start because I am a person who has a high sense of curiosity so I want to explore it so that I can be like them even more than them in profitThe way you call him and only looking for profit on this forum, I believe your friend is a bounty hunter who just spam, abusing with multiple alts and don't care anything about the forum. I suggest you to not follow the same path like your friends, please learn from the basic about Bitcoin and the forum, until you're already familiar with it, you can start contribute by posting high quality post.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 29, 2022, 04:49:48 AMthat's true sir my friends get income from this forum but I don't know where to start because I am a person who has a high sense of curiosity so I want to explore it so that I can be like them even more than them in profitUh oh, guess my gut feeling was right from my previous reply to you. You are just here to earn and not to learn. This is a forum and not an earning platform. Get that right, OP.Let me tell you a magical story - You're not going to earn a single dollar in here if your primary goal in here is to just go for bounties. The forum allows everyone to have the opportunity to earn from bounties, but if your primary goal in the forum is just that, then you would be better off just freelancing.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: It is indeed true that we can earn money in this forum but it's not the forum itself that will hire you if you pass the requirements. Honestly, this forum is all about sharing, helping and learning just what we did to help you understand what this forum is all about. Because of some projects offering money to those who join their signature campaign made other people do stupid things such as posting consecutively just to be able to reach the quota needed that result in spamming the forum. If you are only here just for the sake of earning money then we can't help you with that. It seems your friend introduced this forum in a wrong way and to be exact, ehe forum doesn't reward people when they are posting.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: isaac_clarke22 on May 29, 2022, 06:12:02 AMQuote from: UpiwArt on May 29, 2022, 04:49:48 AMthat's true sir my friends get income from this forum but I don't know where to start because I am a person who has a high sense of curiosity so I want to explore it so that I can be like them even more than them in profitUh oh, guess my gut feeling was right from my previous reply to you. You are just here to earn and not to learn. This is a forum and not an earning platform. Get that right, OP.When introduced to something, one tends to act according to how it was presented to them until taught otherwise. That seems to be the case here;Many users are on this forum only for bounties and spam to earn. That is all they know about the forum. If they presented the forum to people, they will teach them to act along those lines. They could even tell them that other sections of the forum does not offer much, and they could even get bashed by other members and tagged merit hunters for posting there, further pushing them to the spam grounds.This doesn't make them bad newbies per se, they just need re-direction. We all started somewhere and probably saw the forum to be something different from how we view it today.Quote from: UpiwArt on May 29, 2022, 05:07:35 AMwhen it comes to goals. I want to get knowledge and money from this forum.so it becomes additional work for meFirstly, posting consecutively is against the forum rules.Secondly, learning and earning are all possible here and there are many members who do it, including myself; however during your early stages of the forum, it's advisable to shelve the idea of earning and focus only on learning and growing your knowledge base. Do not be to desperate to rank up or earn merits, just read and learn as much as you can, find an interest and genuinely enjoy this forum, anything else can come later.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 29, 2022, 04:49:48 AMthat's true sir my friends get income from this forum but I don't know where to start because I am a person who has a high sense of curiosity so I want to explore it so that I can be like them even more than them in profitThe good news is that you at least stay on one topic, and do not create a bunch of others.First, stop responding by creating a new post after your post.Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM32. Posting multiple posts in a row (excluding bumps and reserved posts by the thread starter) is not allowed.Secondly, if your friends, as you call them, are doing something here and still doing well and making an income, why don't you ask them?However, to remove the beautiful curtains from your eyes, you need to tell yourself directly and honestly that you will not get good money until you understand how the forum works. Grow in rank, and that takes time. To do this, more reading and trying to block the "bounty" section. Because by visiting it, you will spend a lot of time, but in the end, you will be left with an empty wallet.Don't believe it? Time will tell.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: UpiwArt on May 29, 2022, 05:07:35 AMwhen it comes to goals. I want to get knowledge and money from this forum.so it becomes additional work for meIn that case, I would recommend learning first, and the money will come later as a result. To begin with, learn the forum rules and how to quote correctly. As you learn, you can actively participate in discussions that interest you. Try to be on-topic and do not spam. This will, in time, allow you to advance your account on this forum and open up many earning opportunities. Good luck.
